mapper.sql: supplier_id, supplier_num, supplier_full_name, supplier_city, type, contacts, contacts_phone, status, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date, isCommission, posPayFlag, cooperation_type, isTest, enterprise_type, address
mapper.select:
select
, from car_biz_supplier where status=1
and supplier_city IN
#{cid}
and supplier_id IN
#{sid}
order by supplier_city , supplier_id

select t.supplier_id supplierId,t.supplier_num supplierNum,t.supplier_full_name supplierFullName,t.supplier_city supplierCity,t.type, t.contacts,t.contacts_phone contactsPhone,t.memo,t.status,t.create_by createBy,t.update_by updateBy,t.create_date createDate, t.update_date updateDate,c.city_name supplierCityName,u1.name createName,u2.name updateName, t.isCommission,t.posPayFlag,t.enterprise_type enterpriseType,t.cooperation_type cooperationType, ct.cooperation_name cooperationName,t.address,t.dispatcher_phone dispatcherPhone from car_biz_supplier t left join car_biz_city c on c.city_id = t.supplier_city left join car_sys_user u1 on u1.user_id = t.create_by left join car_sys_user u2 on u2.user_id = t.update_by left join car_biz_cooperation_type ct on ct.id = t.cooperation_type where 1=1 and t.supplier_id = #{supplierId}
select supplier_id from car_biz_supplier where status = 1 and supplier_full_name = #{supplierName}

select
,
from car_biz_supplier where supplier_id in
#{item}
select supplier_full_name from car_biz_supplier where supplier_id = #{supplierId}

select t.supplier_id supplierId, t.supplier_full_name supplierFullName, t.supplier_city supplierCity, c.city_name cityName from car_biz_supplier t left join car_biz_city c on c.city_id = t.supplier_city where t.status=1
and t.supplier_id IN (${supplierIds})

SELECT CONCAT_WS('-', cbc.city_name, cbs.supplier_full_name) supplierName, cbs.supplier_id as supplierId FROM car_biz_supplier cbs LEFT JOIN car_biz_city cbc ON cbs.supplier_city = cbc.city_id where cbs.supplier_id in
#{item}
SELECT t.dispatcher_phone FROM car_biz_supplier t WHERE t.supplier_id = #{supplierId}

select
,
from car_biz_supplier where supplier_city = #{supplierCity} and status = 1 and supplier_full_name like '千里眼%'
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into car_biz_supplier
supplier_num,
supplier_full_name,
supplier_city,
type,
contacts,
contacts_phone,
status,
create_by,
update_by,
create_date,
update_date,
isCommission,
posPayFlag,
cooperation_type,
isTest,
enterprise_type,
address,
memo,
dispatcher_phone,
is_two_shifts,

#{supplierFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplierCity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update car_biz_supplier
supplier_num = #{supplierNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_full_name = #{supplierFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_city = #{supplierCity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contacts_phone = #{contactsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isCommission = #{iscommission,jdbcType=INTEGER},
posPayFlag = #{pospayflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cooperation_type = #{cooperationType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isTest = #{istest,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enterprise_type = #{enterpriseType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
dispatcher_phone = #{dispatcherPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_two_shifts = #{isTwoShifts,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) from car_biz_supplier where supplier_full_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT supplier_id, supplier_num, supplier_full_name, supplier_city, supplier_type, type, contacts, contacts_phone, cbs.memo, cbs.status, cbs.create_by, cbs.update_by, cbs.create_date, cbs.update_date, isCommission, posPayFlag, cooperation_type, enterprise_type , address , dispatcher_phone, is_two_shifts, cbc.city_name as supplier_city_name, cbct.cooperation_name FROM car_biz_supplier cbs LEFT JOIN car_biz_city cbc ON cbs.supplier_city = cbc.city_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_cooperation_type cbct ON cbs.cooperation_type = cbct.id WHERE cbs.supplier_id = #{supplierId}

select
, ,(case status when 0 then CONCAT(supplier_full_name, "_无效") else supplier_full_name end ) supplier_full_name supplier_full_name from car_biz_supplier where 1=1
and supplier_city IN
#{cid}
and supplier_id IN
#{sid}
order by supplier_city , supplier_id
